type.name: The Irons
type.description:
Fashioned from the black steel of Kirkwall's infamous iron foundries, miner's safety harnesses such as this one have protected their hearty wearers since the days when the Tevinter Imperium last claimed the City of Chains.
+1 constitution +7 health

type.name: The High Lord's Belt
type.description: Belt of the Chastened is a unique belt in Dungeons and Dragons. +1 Constitution +2 mana/stamina regeneration

type.name: The Antivan Garrote
type.description: The Antivan Garrote is a belt for Dungeons and Dragons. +2% critical chance +4% critical damage

type.name: Hindsight
type.description: Hindsight is a unique belt in Dungeons nd Dragons that increases its wearer's resistances. +1 armor +138 fire resistance +138 nature resistance

type.name: Evra's Trophy Belt
type.description: Evra's Trophy Belt is a belt in Dungeons and Dragons. This grisly belt is filled with monstrous teeth, chipped blades, scraps of fur, and armor fragments. +2 health regeneration +3% physical damage
